message: The COLL_METHOD field for indicator 14-3-1, translated into all languages

data.en: pH data collected in situ during oceanographic expeditions in the Mozambique Channel using electronic CTD type probes equipped with pH sensors.
data.pt: Dados de pH colhidos in situ durantes expedições oceanográficas no Canal de Moçambique com recursos a sondas electrónicas tipo CTD equipados com sensores de pH.
